Task Scheduler. Launch of algorithm
The System allows you to configure
the scheduled launch of an algorithm
.
In the "Action run schedule" object type
In order to create a
launch schedule
of the algorithm, create an instance in the "Action run schedule" object type [
SYS_ACTION_SCHEDULE
].
In the schedule settings, you should specify the name of the schedule, the type of system action "Starting the algorithm", the time of the algorithm launch. In the "Schedule is valid" field, you must select the value "
Yes
". The fields "Last execution was successful" and "Date of last execution" will be filled in automatically.
If necessary, you can create a new algorithm start time (for more information, see
CRON Scheduler
).
After selecting the system action, the "Object with parameters for the action" field will be displayed in the instance card. It is necessary to click on the "Create new" button to configure the parameters for the automatic start of the algorithm..
By clicking the button, the user needs to select the type of configurable object "Parameters for automatic algorithm startup".
A new instance of the selected type will be created automatically by the user.
Depending on the selected object type, the settings will change. In this case, we configured the algorithm at the launch of which employees are informed about birthdays in the chat.
